item.title: Configuring Cloudflare for SaaS
item.description: Configuring Cloudflare for SaaS ​​ Prerequisites Before you can start creating custom hostnames, you need to have access to Cloudflare for SaaS. If you have not used the Cloudflare API previously, review our API documentation. If there are multiple proxied DNS records for one zone, Cloudflare must prioritize which record controls the zone settings and associated origin server. Adding a new custom hostname may take priority over your current settings or cause your settings to no longer apply.
